mapper.insert: insert into jh_admin (admin_id, admin_name, admin_password, admin_phone, admin_Email) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_name, admin_password, admin_phone, admin_Email from jh_admin
